participant_1.background:
I like to analyze my friends' behavior and try to understand their motivations.
I enjoyed listening to my neighbors' conversations while I was mountain biking last year.
i just want my voice to be heard.
i enjoy eating italian food.
I am often in pain so I read to distract myself.

participant_2.background:
My art has helped me cope with the loss of my parents.
I'm doing my best to stay positive and make the most of my time in school, but I miss being a kid sometimes.
my mom is a nurse.
and , my best friend is abigail.
one day i played the lottery.

content.text: Hi, how are you?
Good! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to draw and paint. It's helped me cope with the loss of my parents.
That's interesting. I like to analyze my friends' behavior and try to understand their motivations.
I'm not sure that I would be very good at that!
It's actually pretty fun. I like to try to figure out why people do the things they do.
Well, I'm sure you're very good at it. I'm just not sure I'm interested in that kind of thing.
That's okay. I'm sure you have other interests that are just as interesting.
Thanks! I like to play the piano and hang out with my friends.
That sounds like fun! I'm not very musical myself, but I enjoy listening to music.
Me too! I love listening to all different kinds of music.
What's your favorite kind of music?
I like a lot of different genres, but I think my favorite is probably rock.
Rock is great! I love the energy of it.
Me too! It's so much fun to dance to.
Do you like to go to concerts?
I love going to concerts! I've seen a lot of great bands live.
That's awesome! I've been to a few concerts, but I've always wanted to see more.
You should definitely go to more! It's a great experience.
